channel.title: Projects on Victor Le
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Victor Le

item.title: Current Role
item.description: TLDR At Frontier Communications, I enabled powerful analyses of disparate datasets by developing and maintaining complex cloud-based ETL pipelines. Subsequently, I built robust, predictive models and dashboards to empower network operations teams’ responses to customer service issues. Description Though exact details are proprietary, I will highlight the breadth of the work that I’ve performed at Frontier Communcations. For context, Frontier Communications is a large-sized telecommunications company, aiming to provide fiber and copper service across the United States.

item.title: Academia
item.description: Academic Research At the University of Michigan in Ann Arbor, I researched specific applications of wearable technology for health monitoring. In particular, I researched the intersection of data science, signal processing, and biomechanics to enhance secondary prevention of motion sickness and dehydration. In these excerpts, I’ll quickly summarize the tangible, experimental work I completed. For context, an abstract is copied below. For an in-depth look at the whole body of work, please refer to my dissertation.

item.title: Music
item.description: a personal project between me and my friends. i hit things. so far, we’ve released two singles; expect an EP soon! Spotify

item.description: Yes I know they’re mostly my dogs Pictures of my little family unit.
